description: Now 50% Sale For Open Event~When you meet a attractive women.You want to appeal to her.Or anytime you want to appeal.This app make it possible easily.You can mind reading magic performance.Your phone show 52 cards and her select one card.When she click the card then your android watch show what she selected.Then you acting like read her mind as real as you can.next say to her what her select.It make you really interesting man.Enjoy it~ Thanks~
descriptionHTML:
Now 50% Sale For Open Event~

When you meet a attractive women.
You want to appeal to her.
Or anytime you want to appeal.

This app make it possible easily.

You can mind reading magic performance.
Your phone show 52 cards and her select one card.
When she click the card then your android watch show what she selected.

Then you acting like read her mind as real as you can.
next say to her what her select.

It make you really interesting man.

Enjoy it~ Thanks~
comments: Awesome app that fools everyone.  The card scroller is top-notch! üòâ  The only issue I can see is maybe have the card appear for a shorter length of time on the watch.  It only  needs to show for a couple seconds.  I am using this app with the invisible deck, and it kills!

Excellent app! So much fun baffling friends and family with this app. The kids are amazed and think I'm magic! And nobody has a clue how it's done. Well done to the developer for promptly fixing the only issue I had with this app, too. Five stars!
Great idea, needs bug fixes Screen on watch has to be on at time of selection or will now work. Maybe have it so that the screen will not shut off when the app is open.
